RelatedSentence: BAGRAM AIR FIELD , Afghanistan - Soldiers assigned to 1 st Platoon , 114th Transportation Company , Minnesota National Guard , and 1 st Platoon , 730th Transportation Company , Army Reserve unit from California , joined forces to conduct a convoy escort team mission to pick up goods from a remote forward operating base in Regional Command - North and transition them to here .

BAGRAM AIR FIELD , Afghanistan - Soldiers assigned to 1 st Platoon , 114th Transportation Company , Minnesota National Guard , and 1 st Platoon , 730th Transportation Company , Army Reserve unit from California , joined forces to conduct a convoy escort team mission to pick up goods from a remote forward operating base in Regional Command - North and transition them to here .

BAGRAM AIR FIELD , Afghanistan - Soldiers assigned to 1 st Platoon , 114th Transportation Company , Minnesota National Guard , and 1 st Platoon , 730th Transportation Company , Army Reserve unit from California , joined forces to conduct a convoy escort team mission to pick up goods from a remote forward operating base in Regional Command - North and transition them to here .

Master Sgt. James Sabyan , convoy commander assigned to 1 st Platoon , 114th TC said Soldiers prepared for their mission by conducting preventive maintenance checks and services on their vehicles and ensuring quality assurance / quality control inspections were completed .
